product_name: Planet Bike Hardcore Mountain Bike Fenders - 60mm
long_description: The Planet Bike Hardcore Mountain Bike fenders provide full coverage, include mud flaps and fit bikes with tires up to 2.35 in. wide. Made from unbreakable, all-weather polycarbonate material; mud flaps provide additional coverage. Release tabs on front fender stays allow front fender to automatically release if something gets caught between the tire and fender. Quick-adjust, stainless-steel hardware is pre-installed for hassle-free mounting. Note: not compatible with suspension forks. Planet Bike Hardcore Mountain Bike fenders include necessary hardware and instructions; fits most bikes.
short_description: The Planet Bike Hardcore Mountain Bike fenders provide full coverage, include mud flaps and fit bikes with tires up to 2.35 in. wide.
